The Coppola Restoration is a digitally restored edition of The Godfather Trilogy. The restoration was supervised by film preservationist Robert A. Harris.

The Godfather: The Coppola Restoration was released on DVD and Blu-ray on September 23, 2008. The Blu-ray box set (four discs) includes high-definition extra features on the restoration and film. They are included on disc 5 of the DVD box set (five discs). Other extras are ported over from Paramount's 2001 DVD release.

*Commentary by Francis Ford Coppola
